name: spx-scrollspy
description:
Automatically add CSS classes to navigation items
and content elements depending on the scroll position.

properties.name: contentClass
properties.description: Applied class to active content element.

properties.name: navClass
properties.description: Applied class to active navigation element.

properties.name: offset
properties.description:
Selects the height of an element (any querySelector value) or number that
is used for offsetting how far from the top the next section is activated.

properties.name: scrolling
properties.description: Activates automatic navigation scrolling and sets the offset.

properties.name: target
properties.description: Target element. Can take any querySelector value. (id, class, tag etc.)

properties.name: urlChange
properties.description: Appends the currently active link to the end of the URL.

events.name: spxScrollspyActivate
events.description: Fires after a link is activated.

events.name: spxScrollspyDeactivate
events.description: Fires after a link is deactivated.
